Player History
Drafted in 20th round, 312nd overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Injured on 5/9/2015 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/30/2018, off Gary Range (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/1/2018, off Agustin Vega (COL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 8/11/2018...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 8/15/2018...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2020...
Injured on 4/23/2021 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 9/6/2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,107,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2022, hitting .359 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,107,143 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,107,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/15/2024 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 3 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2024...
10/20/2024: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $14,500,000 per year, for 5 years.
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
